outputs.output_descr: The Project is aimed at physical infrastructure development and building institutional capacity. These objectives will support the University of Juba College of Law (UJCL) to achieve its mission of laying a strong foundation for a united, peaceful and prosperous society based on knowledge, justice, equality, respect for human rights and the rule of law premised on access to legal education and knowledge. This is a pivotal concept for a solid, democratic Southern Sudan based on the adherence to respect for the rule of law.

project_descr: Access to Justice and Fostering a Culture of Human Rights Awareness Project
